thread.title: Subaru South Orlando is Hosting a Pet Food Drive With a Local Animal Rescue
thread.title_full: Subaru South Orlando is Hosting a Pet Food Drive With a Local Animal Rescue | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: Subaru South Orlando is Hosting a Pet Food Drive With a Local Animal Rescue
text:
(MENAFN Press) Adorable sleeping puppy Dog hanging out Adorable smiling dog Cute dog in a sweater Happy puppy playing with a toy ORLANDO Fla. - Oct. 16 2015 - PRLog -- Subaru South Orlando is proud to host a pet food drive to benefit The Healing Ark Animal Rescue a local organization. This is a month-long effort with food donations being accepted through October 31 2015.Food donations will directly benefit Orlando area cats dogs and horses who are in dire need. These animals have suffered abandonment and abuse and are often disabled or have been thrown away. The Healing Ark Animal Rescue assists in restoring them to good health and providing them with a forever home and sanctuary where they can happily thrive.Subaru South Orlando is proud to host this event which helps community creatures that don''t have a voice. Throughout October we are accepting Mighty Dog canned food Pedigree pouches and Friskies canned food. Those interested in offering their help can drop off donations at the front of the dealership.We are always seeking ways to get involved in the community and make it a better place to live for all of our residents furry and otherwise. Any assistance is appreciated and goes a long way toward healing local animals who need it most.For more information please contact: ubaru South Orlando is a recently-purchased franchise of Coastal States Automotive Group LLC. which owns 7 dealerships featuring 11 franchises at the New River Auto Mall in the South Carolina Lowcountry including Audi Chrysler Dodge Hyundai Jeep Jaguar Land Rover Porsche Ram Subaru and Volkswagen. The Group also recently purchased Savannah Volkswagen. In addition to vehicle sales Coastal States Automotive Group owns a state-of-the-art Collision Center that provides car and truck collision repair and paint for all brands including aluminum body vehicles. The group also owns NRAM Insurance an Allstate Insurance Agency and the Wellness Institute a facility that offers physical therapy yoga personal training golf/tennis swing analysis and more.Photos:http://www.prlog.org/12501491/1http://www.prlog.org/12501491/2http://www.prlog.org/12501491/3http://www.prlog.org/12501491/4http://www.prlog.org/12501491/5 --- End ---
